time_to_return.description: The number of days after purchase a customer can return the item

returns_location_id.description: Jet's unique ID for a given fulfillment node

items.title: ReturnsExceptionItem
items.description: Returns exception of particular fulfillment node

service_level.description:
Generic descriptions of shipment delivery times

                        #Logic 
                        This field should be used if you are defining your shipping options by service_level 
                        
                        #Valid Values 
                        *Standard
                        *Expedited 
                        *Scheduled
                        *NextDay 
                        *SecondDay

shipping_method.description:
A specific shipping method e.g. UPS Ground, UPS Next Day Air, FedEx Home

                        #Logic 
                        This should be used if you want the change to apply to a specific shipping_method.  If shipping_carrier is populated, this field will be ignored. Use this field if you are defining your shipping
                        options by 'shipping_method'

returns_exception_type.description:
Indicates if you want the product to be shipped exclusively (only with) or restrictively (not including) 

                        #Valid Values
                        * restricted - The product cannot be shipped using the shipping method or shipping level provided
                        * exclusive - The product should only be shipped using the shipping method or shipping level provided
